channel.title: Ip displaying on the console for keyauth
channel.description:
Hello, i am new and abit lost i managed to add the auth to my python script and works fine and all even when logging in, 1 thing i wish to remove though is the part where when i login it shows my ip and hardware id and so on.. how do i remove this completely? i am new with python and just trying to learn :slight_smile:
:white_check_mark: I agree that **I will not ask for help with non-KeyAuth related topics**, this community site **is only for asking about the default KeyAuth example with NO changes made to it**
